conclusion: Analyze the flow pattern step by step to determine which container the liquid will flow into.
The liquid starts at points A, B, C, and D.
The liquid flows out from points A, B, C, and D.
The liquid flows through baffles, which are represented by the red arrows.
The baffles are positioned to direct the flow.
The baffles are positioned such that the liquid is directed towards container E.
The liquid will flow into container E after passing through the baffles.
